thread.title: Chris Hartney

author: Chris Hartney
title: Chris Hartney
text:
This service is brilliant. I ordered the tyres yesterday (Saturday) and was pleasantly surprised that there was a next day option. This morning I received an email stating that my fitting time was scheduled for between 12:11 and 14:11. At approximately 11:55 the fitter turned up, so I gave him my locking wheel nut bit and left him to get on with it. Approximately 45 minutes later all four tyres had been changed and I hadn't left the comfort of my own home.
Tyres On The Drive offer a wide range of tyres by all the main brands, plus several that I haven't come accross and they are competitively priced.
Within twenty minutes of the fitter (Danny W) I received an email containing my invoice, details of the work completed and a report on the state of each set of brake pads and discs. It also had the fitters name, hence the reference to Danny W.
I cannot find fault with this service, which is quite unusual for me. I will definately be using Tyres On The Drive again, but hopefully not this year.
